name: ON A PARTICULARLY COLD DAY IN JANUARY
name_original: ON A PARTICULARLY COLD DAY IN JANUARY
description:
A short adventure game that tells the story of a novelist who has a bad gambling habit. It focuses on environmental storytelling and poetic soundscapes to create a unique atmosphere!

Short and can be beaten in 30 minutes or less. This is a prototype for our upcoming TOWN WITH NO CHEER series of games that all take place in Saintsville.
